mapper.sql: a.pid AS "pid", a.p_name AS "pName", a.p_code AS "pCode", a.p_desc AS "pDesc", a.aid AS "aid", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN auto_area b ON b.aid = a.aid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auto_province( pid, p_name, p_code, p_desc, aid, remarks, create_by, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{pid}, #{pName}, #{pCode}, #{pDesc}, #{aid}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auto_province SET p_name = #{pName}, p_code = #{pCode}, p_desc = #{pDesc}, aid = #{aid}, remarks = #{remarks}, del_flag = #{delFlag} WHERE pid = #{id}
